command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The data store for collected monitoring data.
The Azure resource ID of an Azure Data Explorer cluster. Value required if kusto-offering-type is adx. Do not pass value if kusto-offering-type is fabric or free.
The Kusto cluster display name. Value required if kusto-offering-type is adx or free. Do not pass value if kusto-offering-type is fabric.
The name of a Kusto database.
The type of a Kusto offering.
The resource ID of a user-assigned managed identity that will be assigned to a new alert rule.
The geo-location where the resource lives

command.name: update
command.argGroup: <arg type="array" var="$properties.identity.userAssigned" options="mi-user-assigned user-assigned" hide="True" group="Identity">

help.short: The data store for collected monitoring data.
The Azure resource ID of an Azure Data Explorer cluster. Value required if kusto-offering-type is adx. Do not pass value if kusto-offering-type is fabric or free.
The Kusto cluster display name. Value required if kusto-offering-type is adx or free. Do not pass value if kusto-offering-type is fabric.
The name of a Kusto database.
The type of a Kusto offering.
The resource ID of a user-assigned managed identity that will be assigned to a new alert rule.
